thread.title: Colbert’s ‘Late Show’ promo spoofs New York Times Oscars ad
thread.title_full: Colbert’s ‘Late Show’ promo spoofs New York Times Oscars ad

author: Dan Snierson
title: Colbert’s ‘Late Show’ promo spoofs New York Times Oscars ad
text:
Email Timothy Kuratek/CBS 
The New York Times did not take Donald Trump’s selective media ban lightly, releasing an ad during the Oscars that showed all the different/misleading/confusing reasons that the truth is more important than ever. Stephen Colbert is building on that idea in a promotion for his live show after Trump’s address to Congress tomorrow night. The 30-second promo features Colbert telling you all the things that POTUS is: a liar; a bully; unstoppable; America’s gullible uncle, Willie Wonka who has been genetically cross-bred with a carnivorous Oompa Loompa; and so much more. See for yourself. 
Like @ nytimes , The Late Show also has a powerful new ad out… https://t.co/8q1ifgZ3mk —The Late Show (@colbertlateshow) February 27, 2017
